question: You work for a company. You have seen some information online about a training course that would be useful for your work.Write a letter to your manager. In your lettergive details of the coursesay how the course would be usefulexplain how the company could help you do this course.
text: I am writing this letter to inform you that I came to know about a 15 days diploma in IFRS, which would definitely help us in consolidating domestic financials with global ones. It is a certification provided by ICAI and the course would cost around Rs.10,000.

It is a regulatory guideline for a global company to amalgamate the cashflows and as of now, we have to take the help of an external agency to merge our books, which after this program would be easy for us to do on our own. This course, along with providing online training for the said purpose, also offers support services for 5 days.

I hereby request you to please allow me 15 days leave, as the timings are from 10 AM till 5 PM. Further, it would be great if you could recommend my name and request HR to sponsor this course because it will make our company independent as well saves our huge cost.
Look forward to hearing a positive response from you.
